wikipedia_page.main: James Joseph Mullen (born June 1970) is a Scottish businessman, the chief executive (CEO) of Reach plc, the UK's largest commercial news publisher, with titles including the Daily Mirror, the Daily Express and InYourArea. He is the former CEO of Ladbrokes, the high street betting chain.

response: * Jim Mullen (businessman) (born 1970), British businessman, CEO of Ladbrokes
* Jim Mullen, chief executive (CEO) of Ladbrokes

*Jim Mullen (baseball) (1883–1925) - American Major League Baseball player
